title: Add farewell function to hello module
intent: Edit hello.py to add a farewell() function that returns the string 'Goodbye, World!' while keeping the existing greet() function unchanged.
forbidden: Do not remove or alter the existing greet() function
acceptance_commands: python -c "from hello import greet, farewell; assert greet() == 'Hello, World!'; assert farewell() == 'Goodbye, World!'"
notes: This edits an existing file. The greet() function must remain exactly as-is. Add farewell() below it.
